issue.title: www.vipbox.lc
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.vipbox.lc/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vipbox.lc%2F) ### Comment > I use vipbox to watch fight streams or wwe but when i tap on “WWE” Or “MMA” for example i have to do it multiple times because it will open another tab and i have to close it each time Username: `@Aguilar6ix` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nmqgns6ix6skcg0gs80c848c44oscwgtbrw9vt621w.jpg?nc=1)
